header_text: You love the great outdoors but have discovered recent unsteadiness in your footing when hiking. Friends notice the change and ask you about what's going on. When you answer, your friends realize that your fun escape has become a tricky challenge.

elements.text: One of your friends finds the perfect walking stick and hands it to you. You continue on your walk feeling...

elements.name: You love the great outdoors but have discovered recent unsteadiness in your footing when hiking. Friends notice the change and ask you about what's going on. elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
